name: Don't spin the dice
description:
Don't spin the dice is a very short scripted narrative game about not spinning a dice.

Somewhat inspired by There Is No Game.

Note : Somehow fullscreen mode in browser breaks the subtitles, don't hesitate to download the game for better performance and stability

The game was made under 48h for GMTK Jam 2022

The voices were generated from Text to Speech using  http://fromtexttospeech.com/
